alert.note: Alert for Portage; Waupaca; Waushara; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 10:29PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wood, Portage, Winnebago, Waushara, Waupaca and western Outagamie Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1028 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fremont, or 9 miles east of Waupaca, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... New London around 1035 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Menasha and Appleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central, northeastern and east central Wisconsin.
